title: Quadric geometric algebra
summary: Quadric geometric algebra (QGA) is a geometrical application of the G 6 , 3 {\displaystyle {\mathcal {G}}_{6,3}} geometric algebra. This algebra is also known as the C â„“ 6 , 3 {\displaystyle {\mathcal {C}}\ell _{6,3}} Clifford algebra. QGA is a super-algebra over G 4 , 1 {\displaystyle {\mathcal {G}}_{4,1}} conformal geometric algebra (CGA) and G 1 , 3 {\displaystyle {\mathcal {G}}_{1,3}} spacetime algebra (STA), which can each be defined within sub-algebras of QGA.
